title: Ravish Kumar’s Report On Christian Michel Extradition Was Not Fake
subtitle: The clipping is a clear case of misleading people as it is an old clipping, and is, thus, out of context in the current scenario.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Senior journalist Ravish Kumar has often found himself becoming the target of online trolls. Amid the extradition of Christian Michel, a European middleman at the heart of the AgustaWestland chopper scam, Ravish has once again become victim of fake news.

A clip of Ravish Kumar, reporting that the Dubai court has not given any order to extradite Christian Michel to India, is doing the rounds of social media. The posts carrying the clip either take a dig at Ravish or accuse him of misreporting.
